SEARCH
Package com.cytech.fenetres

Class PagePrincipaleUtilisateurController

java.lang.Object
com.cytech.fenetres.PagePrincipaleUtilisateurController
public class PagePrincipaleUtilisateurController extends Object
Controller for the main user page. Handles user interactions with the genealogical tree, including viewing, modifying, and generating different representations of the tree.

    • genererArbreGraphiquement

      public void genererArbreGraphiquement(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the button click to generate a graphical representation of the genealogical tree. Creates and displays a new window with the tree visualization.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggered this method

    • genererArbreConsole

      public void genererArbreConsole(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the button click to generate a console representation of the genealogical tree. Displays the family relationships in the console.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggered this method
